channel.title: OSM on Nishadh KA
channel.description: Recent content in OSM on Nishadh KA

item.title: Finding route between two points from OSM road network input
item.description: Finding navigable route such as for driving between two points has several application. Open Street Map(OSM) with its free downloadable map, routing algorithms can be applied to find best route between two location. OSMNX, a python library import osm (a default file format provided by OSM) into graphml format which can be used with network analysis to get route network. The OSM downloaded from overpass using the polygon bouundary for an urban area, the overpass query https://overpass-api.
